articles.title: Ghana: Agbogbloshie Traders Ordered to Leave ...Ahead of Decongestion Exercise
articles.summary: [Ghanaian Times] The Greater Accra Regional Minister, Ms Linda Obenewaa Akweley Ocloo, has directed traders at the Agbogbloshie Onion Market to vacate the area in lieu of a major decongestion exercise scheduled next month.
